PERSONA:
john is a 68-year-old married man living in a non-metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically in the east north central division. he is a white non-hispanic individual who was born in the united states and has been a citizen his entire life.

john completed some college education but did not obtain a degree. he identifies as having no particular religious affiliation, although he was raised in a christian household. john seldom attends religious services.

politically, john considers himself an independent voter, but he leans towards and typically supports the republican party due to his conservative ideological views. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously.

financially, john falls into the upper-income tier, earning between $80,000 and $90,000 annually. despite his comfortable financial situation, he does not actively participate in volunteerism or community service activities.

in his personal life, john values his marriage and family relationships. he enjoys spending time with his spouse and engaging in leisure activities suitable for his age and location, such as gardening, fishing, or attending local community events.

overall, john is a traditional, conservative-leaning individual who prioritizes his family, financial stability, and adherence to his values and beliefs.
